datalib.advanced_analysis module

class datalib.advanced_analysis.MachineLearningModels[source]

Bases: object

static decision_tree_classification(X, y)[source]

Performs decision tree classification on the data. :param X: Features :param y: Target variable :return: Trained DecisionTreeClassifier model

static kmeans_clustering(data, n_clusters)[source]

Performs KMeans clustering on the data. :param data: The data to cluster :param n_clusters: The number of clusters to form :return: Trained KMeans model

static linear_regression(X, y)[source]

Performs linear regression on the provided data. :param X: Features :param y: Target variable :return: Trained LinearRegression model

static pca_analysis(data, n_components)[source]

Performs PCA analysis on the data. :param data: The data for PCA :param n_components: Number of components to retain :return: Trained PCA model and transformed data

datalib.manipulation_data module

class datalib.manipulation_data.DataManipulation[source]

Bases: object

static filter_data(dataframe, condition)[source]

Filtre les données d’un DataFrame selon une condition. :param dataframe: Le DataFrame à filtrer. :param condition: Un dictionnaire de conditions à appliquer sur les colonnes. :return: pandas.DataFrame

static handle_missing_values(df, method='fill', fill_value=None)[source]

Handle missing values in the DataFrame. :param df: The DataFrame with missing values. :param method: The method to handle missing values. Can be ‘drop’, ‘fill’. :param fill_value: The value to use for filling missing values (used when method=’fill’). :return: DataFrame with missing values handled.

static load_csv(filepath)[source]

Charge un fichier CSV et retourne un DataFrame pandas. :param filepath: Le chemin du fichier CSV à charger. :return: pandas.DataFrame

static normalize_data(dataframe, columns)[source]

Normalise les données des colonnes spécifiées entre 0 et 1. :param dataframe: Le DataFrame contenant les données. :param columns: Liste des noms des colonnes à normaliser. :return: pandas.DataFrame avec les données normalisées.

static save_csv(dataframe, filepath)[source]

Enregistre un DataFrame pandas dans un fichier CSV. :param dataframe: Le DataFrame à enregistrer. :param filepath: Le chemin du fichier de sortie.

static plot_bar(data, title='Bar Chart', xlabel='X-axis', ylabel='Y-axis')[source]

Plot a bar chart. :param data: Data for the bar chart (usually a pandas Series or DataFrame). :param title: Title of the chart. :param xlabel: Label for the X-axis. :param ylabel: Label for the Y-axis.

static plot_correlation_matrix(data)[source]

Plot the correlation matrix as a heatmap. :param data: DataFrame containing the data to plot.
